name: OregonOceanBarReport
0:
”Alexa, open Oregon Ocean Bar Report”
”list locations”
”help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: oregon ocean bar report
des:
This skill provides the current bar report that is posted on the US Coast Guard Bar Observation and Status site.
https://www.weather.gov/pqr/barcams

To launch, just say 'Alexa, launch Oregon Ocean Bar Report' or 'Alexa, open Oregon Ocean Bar Report'

You can then get a list of stations available by saying:
"list locations"

To get the latest report, for example at Depoe Bay, just say 'get report for Depoe Bay' 

This tool should be used for informational purposes only. Captains should get updated reports while on the water by using a Marine VHF radio to communicate with the local Coast Guard Station on channel 16 and 22A.

As always, safe navigation is the responsibility of the operator of each vessel. Information from this skill is provided as information to assist mariners in navigating safely. The information provided reflects conditions at the time the bar report was posted from the USCG and may not reflect current conditions. Bar conditions are subject to change without notice. This report should NOT be used as the sole source of information when making a decision to cross the bar. Mariners are advised to use all means available to safely evaluate bar conditions and risk before crossing the bar.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
